text: Theodore "Ted" Dallas is the current President and COO of NHS Human Services Inc., a non-profit organization that provides integrated services in the areas of mental health, addictive diseases, autism, education, intellectual/developmental disabilities, juvenile justice, and therapeutic family care to special needs children and adults in the United States.https://www.bloomberg.com/research/stocks/private/snapshot.asp?privcapId=4240089 He was the former Pennsylvania Secretary of Human Services under Pennsylvania Governor Tom Wolf from June 2015 until August 2017. Previously, he served as Maryland Secretary of Human Resources from 2011 until 2015 in the administration of Maryland Governor Martin O'Malley. ==References== ==External links== *Ted Dallas at the Maryland Manual On-Line Category:Living people Category:State cabinet secretaries of Pennsylvania Category:State cabinet secretaries of Maryland Category:University of Pennsylvania alumni Category:Temple University alumni Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Ted Dallas
